description: Mental health absences among health staff in Jersey increase by 20% in first six months of Covid-19.
title: Covid-19: Jersey health workers miss 1,000 more days due to mental health issues
title_page: Covid-19: Jersey health workers miss 1,000 more days due to mental health issues - BBC News
maintext: She said: "You just want to get the patient results out as quickly and accurately as you can, but there's only so much you can actually do with just one pair of hands."
